price: (16) Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.
arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ākhidhīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum innahum kānū qabla dhālika muḥ'sinīna
